Class BufferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupb.lathe.util.BufferUtils

  • public class BufferUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom buffer utils. LWJGL has one, but this one is a lightweight version.

    ashtonwalden
